title: LFM Bronze flex team!
body:
Hello! I am looking for friendly competitive players who would like to play _Ranked Flex_, we so far have an adc and a mid lane. Please respond with your lane here and your champion(s) of choice! We will figure something out and I look forward to climbing the ladder with you!

Here is our discord: https://discord.gg/qrQAE

Please feel free to drop in just to chat: We are usually on later at night! (8-10pm est)

replies.body: IGN: Red Sky Grishka, Im a jungle/support main, just add me in-game, i usually play from 4:30-10:30 EST everyday

Hey, I usually only do solo q, so I'm not ranked in flex but I'm B3 in solo, pretty versatile when it comes to role. Add me.
If I had to choose a lane it would probably be JG/Top.

Hi LighterTheInsane,

I am building an e-sports club called Rising Power! We have many members in the club who may want to be apart of your flex team. If you are looking to recruit some players please check out my club, you may find some and build great friendships with club members. If you discover that this club is a good fit for you we will sponsor your newly formed team and house it as one of our club teams. You can join our discord server https://discord.gg/bAKthcU or visit our website http://www.risingpower.net for more information. Hope to see you in Discord! Best of luck to you this season.

added.
we've been playing some bronze flexers and duos from my discord im sure anyone there would like to join the party. come hang out

KEMICAL
https://discord.gg/n7XYfFN
What time do you guys prefer to play? I main support

> [{quoted}](name=Zhou Tai,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=8ezjRKuh,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-02-20T05:34:07.782+0000)

> What time do you guys prefer to play? I main support

usually at night (8-12pm est) or the evening (est standard).
